data.max_messages_history: Maximum number of messages in the history

data_description.max_messages_history: Defines how many recent messages will be kept in the history for each section
data_description.allow_control: Allow the agent to control their entities, this allowed access to the Tools by the agent
data_description.agent_prompt: This prompt is rendered by `template`, so you can use variables. He is sending each interaction with the stackspot agent
data_description.llm_model: LLM model of the agent. This has no effect except for display on the created device

user.title: StackSpot - New Knowledge Source
user.description:
KS are used to give agents more context, please read: https://ai.stackspot.com/docs/knowledge-source/ks 
After creating KS you should access Stackspot there and link it to your agent

data_description.ks_template: This template will be redevised and the result will be sent to KS, you can also use the variables provided by the integration.
data_description.interval_update: Time interval that integration must update the KS with the template value.
